dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1969
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for funds. She says they have enough for a month or two and reminds us that we will receive as we measure our gifts.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 904 1969-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
